name: The OWO Party!
description:
The OWO Party is an indie game developed by ISammer aka Morgan Work, a small but soulful game, in this game you are an assassin and you have to kill the impostor at the party, but you end up in a prison,wait,WHAT??? I hope you like it!

Music Used in game: 
(6) An Ancient King 👑 - YouTube
(6) Kevin MacLeod - 8bit Dungeon Boss ♫ NO COPYRIGHT 8-bit Music - YouTube

Some of textures are from CC0 TEXTURES: CC0 Textures - Free Public Domain PBR Materials
